description: [``botocore``] Bugfix: Improved input validation for RegisterInstance action, InstanceId field
[``botocore``] IAM Access Control for Amazon MSK enables you to create clusters that use IAM to authenticate clients and to allow or deny Apache Kafka actions for those clients.

[``botocore``] AWS Snow Family adds APIs for ordering and managing Snow jobs with long term pricing
